about_the_game:
Synopsis

Luminora, a mysterious island brimming with ancient secrets.

The ancient civilization that once ruled here developed the arcane of extracting the life force of beings, which brought great prosperity to the island.
However, as is often the case with eternal ambitions, their quest for divine power led them to a curse that enveloped the island in darkness.

Centuries later, a wanderer caught in the maelstrom of a kraken's wrath, drifts ashore onto this mysterious forsaken island.
To escape, you must unravel the hidden secrets of its ancient past. But be careful — nightfall here conceals shadows and horrors beyond imagination...

Day and Night, Dual Time Zone



Daytime – Explore the Vast Open World and Unveil the Island’s Secrets
Within the shadows left by the ancient civilization lies the key to escaping this vast island. Seal away their spirits, seek the aid of the fairy Blifia, and discover the path to freedom. Venture through a land fraught with peril, encounter cursed monsters and formidable bosses, and press onward toward the shining promise of freedom.

Nightfall – Defend Against the Encroaching Terror
As night falls, the island transforms into a land of death. Utilize your combat skills and survival strategies to fend off the relentless undead and claim your rewards. Gather resources that can aid you on your journey and survive the deadly struggle that awaits.

The fate of your escape rests solely on your adventures and choices. How long will you endure on this island before the darkness overwhelms you?

How to Survive in Daytime

FEATURE 1: Unveil the ancient secrets hidden within the island!
Collect mystical ores,'Cthugha Stones', and uncover hidden secrets across the island as you embark on your survival adventure.
Write your own story in this expansive world.
Boundless freedom and a vast world await you!



FEATURE 2: Increase your power by overcoming the cursed beasts and enigmatic bosses of the forsaken island!
Scattered across the island are cursed monsters and ancient bosses, waiting for you from times long past.
Gather resources on the island to craft enhanced weapons and armor, and use various skills in action-packed battles to defeat countless enemies and level up.



FEATURE 3: Prepare for the coming night with your own custom fortress!
Set up traps and obstacles to prevent enemy invasions, and use a variety of construction features to create a secure refuge and prepare for impending threats!

How to Survive in Nightfall

FEATURE 1: Endure the relentless swarm of nightfall’s monsters!
As evening falls, a vast horde of monsters will emerge. They will pursue you, no matter where you hide or where you are. Survive the relentless onslaught of the undead.



FEATURE 2: Ward off the horrors of the night with your own survival strategy!
There are various strategies prepared to survive against the hordes of monsters. Use your own ingenious strategy to protect yourself from the impending threats.

short_description: 「IfSunSets」 is a survival RPG adventure game. During the day, secure necessary supplies across the island, and survive the night against strong and terrifying monsters that track you down. You can utilize resources you've secured to build a base to fend off threatening monsters.
supported_languages: English, Korean, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Hindi
